title: Delvaux Brillant MM
description: Delvaux Brillant MM 2Way bag in black smooth calfskin leather. Featuring silver-tone hardware, single rolled top handle and the signature 'D' buckle closure. The frontal flap opens to a beige leather interior with a patch pocket and a zip pocket. Approximate dimensions: 28cm(B-L) x 23cm(H) x 12cm(D), 12cm handle drop, and 50cm detachable & adjustable flat leather shoulder strap drop. With LegitApp Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned).
